Rate Card

Last Modified: 30 Sept 2025

I offer a variety of services on Hourly and Daily rates. These are estimates, please contact me to negotiate a formal agreement. I can reduce prices to accomodate people from low-income and marginalised backgrounds.

I have a 1st in BA Theatre and Performance from The University of Leeds, and have been working in Performing Arts and Adult Education since 2018.

Click to see my full portfolio of previous experience.

To see my CV, please email me at

laurence(@)improvlaurie(.)co(.)uk - minus the brackets.

Hourly Rate - £60

If more than 4 hours, the day rate may apply instead.

  • Performance skills tutoring Advising on theatrical technique, improvisation, public speaking. I am skilled in coaching voice projection.
  • Dramaturgy Researching a topic using academic methods, critiquing a work of performance at any stage of development.
  • Marketing support Using my network and reputation to build awareness for a product, and write copy appropriate for that audience. Particular expertise for trans projects. If you want your idea to reach trans people, I can make it happen.

Daily Rate - £300

Equivelant to 6 hrs, a saving of £60, compared to the Hourly rate.

  • Designing and facillitating a 2-hr workshop on a given topic This includes the time taken to research the topic, and write a lesson plan tailored to the attendees. The depth of knowledge required may increase the cost
  • Directing a theatrical production This is purely the rate for Directing, and not for a role with both Directing and Producing responsibilities such as marketing, PR, venue liason, tour booking, expensing etc. Please contact me to negotiate a different rate for that type of role.
